Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_nb94f40i&referenceId=1_nb94f40i&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: India's services sector expanded for a fifth straight month in December, albeit at a slower pace than in the previous month, as demand rose but concerns over another wave of COVID-19 and inflationary pressures cast a shadow over the outlook, a survey showed.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3sWQHG6
